value:
Hmm... There are many Heroes here,
no doubt. But few show as much skin
as I...

The Outrealms resort was so
exhilarating! I kept busy training on
the beach, smiting miscreants, and—$k$pit pains me to admit this—sinning.

When I consider the poor souls who,
barefoot, might trod on a pebble...I
know I must redouble my efforts.$k$pWhat efforts? To remove debris at
every opportunity! I can only hope this
eases your journeys, too.

Might you be willing to train with me?
It pains me to say it, but your
defenses are...lacking.$k$pPerhaps we can forge a body of steel
to match your stout heart!

Ah, I'm fretting over Lord Chrom and
Lady Lissa. I hope they don't step on
seashells while I'm away!

I apologize for appearing before you
like this. I was tasked with conveying
$Nf's tidings.

Delightful. I can't wait to run and
jump into the sea!

My beach training regimen seems
to have paid off.

How embarrassing. Perhaps it's
the heat...

You honor me. I'll focus on my
efforts to clean up seashells.

I am Frederick. I was on the beach
protecting Lord Chrom. Tell me...
Where am I now?

I feel that I've gotten much stronger
since I came here. You've put a lot
of time and energy into my training.$k$pHonestly, I had my misgivings at
first. I never expected you to take me
seriously, dressed like this...$k$pHow wrong I was. You helped me
train. Even so, I worried that you
might earn my trust and then...$k$pyou'd spring a terrible surprise on me.
I spent my nights sleepless, certain
you'd suddenly force me to eat bear...$k$pBut thinking about it, I confess I can
see no reason you'd ever do that,
Summoner.$k$pTo make amends, I'll give my utmost
on the battlefield.$k$pI've always relied on my armor, but
now it's my zeal that will see me
through!
はいっ
でやあ！
くっ…！
Always impressive.
Prepare to be capsized!
Go soak your head!
Not on this beach!
Tropical attack!
Sunset...
Hahaha
My apologies for my lack of decorum...and suitable clothing.
Out of my armor, I am actually a rather accomplished swimmer.
I usually dress more modestly, but I am attempting to, uh, relax.
The Shepherds once visited an otherworldly tropical resort. It was...nice.
I have cleared the beach of trash, as well as driftwood and shells.
I wish I had managed to catch a sea creature to bring home.
I hope you enjoy this summer. I will, of course, still be at your side in the fall.
Of course.
Whew! Hot out.
Ah, shell.
